section.heading: Real property tax assignment; sale and transfers — Applicability of changed interest rates.

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 4(l) of Real Property Tax Clarity and Litter Control Administration Temporary Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Law 14-8, June 13, 2001, law notification 48 DCR 5916).

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 4(j)(2) of Real Property Tax Clarity and Litter Control Administration Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-22, March 16, 2001, 48 DCR 2706).
